experience: You and Steven both know Gelie Akhenblit, Derek Neighbors, and 8 others
My responsibilities include, but are not limited to research, implementation and detailed reporting for clients' SEM, SEO and other related fields in their overall digital marketing strategy.

I built AdWords campaigns for Google customers and guided them through initial training. Assisting with optimization to increase ROI for customers, I provided the support to decrease ad spend while increasing clicks. I up sold Google AdWords customers and helped new hires with training, technical support, account setup, etc.

My weekly responsibilities include, but were not limited to social media marketing, email campaigns, search engine optimization, blogging, obtaining new clients, consulting, brand awareness and overall marketing strategy. I collaborated with others in my business network when working on more substantial projects.
Watched and refereed dodgeball team competitions.
Creative, Social Marketing Specialist and Client Relations, Intern

From day one I was an asset to the communications team. I edited the roadmaps of potential business' digital marketing strategies. My projects required skills in copywriting, creating content strategy, and client relations.I was also involved with the developing the business process and contributed to brainstorms and research and development for improving the business of BizziBiz itself. Toward the middle of my experience, I created marketing strategies including but not limited to Facebook contests, email marketing strategies, as well as contacting the client and making sure they understood their digital marketing strategy and were satisfied with their plan.

I sold product and informed future buyers about LookAtMyFire's merchandise. I also helped build and break down booths and showrooms for promotional trade shows.Shows include: The Home & Garden Show, Barrett Jackson, and Sonoma Showcase Festival: Wine Jazz Art Cuisine.

I worked directly with the CEO to build the iSearchDecor social media strategy from the ground up.After completing the internship I continued as a business consultant, managing iSearchDecor's social marketing and capturing media for their merchants. Other projects I have worked on include but are not limited to: Creating banners using Photoshop, video production and photography, promotions, conducting interviews and event coordination.

I was a friendly host, responsible for greeting guests and scheduling big parties as well as couples and families. When I was needed I would help in the kitchen. The restaurant was really busy on the weekends so I made an effort to pitch in when I could. This was an energetic learning experience for customer service.

December 7, 2011, Steven worked with Colby in the same group

Dude is a grinder. But his nose isn't limited to the grindstone. You'll also find it in the clouds, coming up with awesome, off-the-wall ideas for everything from 140-character copy to brand campaigns. Steven defines what you want on your side - someone who isn't afraid to ask questions in the best interest of the project, but will 100% align with the final decision and the team.People talk about hedgehog concepts - Steven's is being the peak of the hill that balances creativity and efficiency. He pursues that with a tenacity for the short-term and a vision for the long-term. If I were a business looking to for someone to lead me into the digital realm, Steven has the tactical experience and breadth of knowledge that I'd want/
